text: 41|47|a antyasamayattepparriyulla ariv avankalekkan matakkappetunnatâ€Œ. palannaleannum avayute pealakalil ninn puratt varunnilla; oru striyum garbham dharikkukayea, prasavikkukayea ceyyunnumilla; avanre ariveat kutiyallate. enre pankalikalevite enn avan avareat viliccuceadikkunna divasam avar parayum: nannalita ninne ariyikkunnu. nannalil (atinnâ€Œ) saksikalayi arumilla
